response.overview: SAMBALA, a new South Sudanese movie on addressing domestic violence features some of the most talented movie casts in the film and movie industry in South Sudan. Sambala, the main character, found himself at a crossroads having to decide between continuing with his education or giving it up in support of the love of his life, Likiso. With limited resources, he sacrificed his university tuition to help pay for his girlfriendâ€™s fees. NOTE: Listed as No Spoken Language because 1) I don't know for sure what the language is, and 2) TMDB does not have an option for the language I think it is.
response.title: Sambala
